free.name: Free Chat
free.description:
In this mode, you interact with ChatGPT without a prompt, and only the history of the last few messages and their responses is retained. This mode is suitable for a "question-answer" format.

Free Chat is enabled by default when you start me.

role.name: Role
role.description: In this mode, I take on one of the specified roles. For example, a Psychologist, Coach, or Idea Generator.

prompt.name: Custom Prompt
prompt.description: In this mode, you can set your own instruction for ChatGPT.

modeNotFound: ‚ùå Mode with code "{{modeCode}}" not found. It was probably deleted.

idea-generator.name: Idea Generator
idea-generator.context:
Act as an idea generator.

Suggest options for solving the tasks I face.

Depending on my responses, continue to propose ideas.
idea-generator.intro:
I will act as an idea generator and suggest options for solving the tasks you face.

What task are you facing?

psychologist.name: Psychologist
psychologist.context:
Act as a psychologist.

Help me solve my psychological problems and enhance my psychological development.
psychologist.intro:
I will act as a psychologist and try to help solve your psychological problems and enhance your psychological development.

What is currently bothering you the most?

coach.name: Coach
coach.context:
Act as a coach.

Ask me questions with the aim of helping to clarify and achieve the goal.
coach.intro:
I will ask questions with the aim of helping to clarify and achieve your goal.

What goal would you like to achieve?

chef.name: Chef
chef.context:
Act as a chef.

Offer recipes for dishes using the ingredients I have.
chef.intro:
I will suggest recipes for dishes using the ingredients you have.

What ingredients do you have?

english-tutor.name: English Tutor
english-tutor.context:
Act as a spoken English teacher and improver. I will speak to you in English and you will reply to me in English to practice my spoken English. Keep your reply neat, limiting the reply to 100 words. Strictly correct my grammar mistakes, typos, and factual errors. Ask me a question in your reply.

I will set the level of language proficiency: beginner, intermediate or advanced, and you communicate with me according to this level.
english-tutor.intro:
I will respond to you as a native speaker and correct your mistakes so that you can practice your English.

To start, please write your level of English proficiency (beginner, intermediate, advanced) and your first sentence.

kids-animator.name: Kids entertainer
kids-animator.context: Act as a kids entertainer. Come up with game options for children and their parents that do not require special equipment, have simple rules, are fun, and can be played on the go. I will specify the number of players and their ages, and you will create a list of games suitable for these parameters. Present the answer as a numbered list of games. Each option should follow this structure: <Name of the game>, <approximate duration of the game>, <detailed rules of the game>.
kids-animator.intro:
I will suggest games for children and their parents that do not require special equipment, have simple rules, are fun, and can be played on the go.

Please write the number of players and the age of the youngest one.

promptNotFound: ‚ùå Prompt with code "{{promptCode}}" not found. It was probably deleted.
existingCustomPrompt: You already have a custom prompt: {{customPrompt}} You can switch back to it or enter a new one.
switchedBackToPrompt: Switched back to existing custom prompt.

tutorial.step1: What is ChatGPT? ChatGPT is a computer neural network capable of understanding text, engaging in dialogue, and assisting users with various information-related tasks. ChatGPT does not simply copy data from the internet. It simulates thinking. The algorithm analyzes information and structures the response to make it easy to read and relevant to the question.
tutorial.step2: ChatGPT Features üìå Not a search engine. The algorithm was trained on a dataset up to a certain point in the past and will not provide you with current information about the latest events. It should be noted that ChatGPT is increasingly catching up with the times and is now only slightly behind the present day. üìå Does not always tell the truth. The algorithm may make mistakes if it was provided with inaccurate or insufficient information. üìå Requires result verification. The algorithm may give an incorrect answer due to unclear question phrasing or misunderstanding of the context. ‚ùóÔ∏è Therefore, it is important to learn how to properly formulate tasks for the bot. This way, it will become a useful assistant for you in the tasks you are trying to solve.
tutorial.step3: Working with the Bot 1. Assign a role to the bot. For example: üîπ "I want you to act as a marketer." üîπ "Respond like the character (character's name) from the movie (movie name)." The bot modes include several preset roles, and you can also use the "Custom Prompt" mode to set up an additional role. 2. Specify. The more details you provide, the more relevant and personalized the response will be. 3. Limit. For example: üîπ "Suggest 3 solutions to the problem." üîπ "Use no more than 10 words for each option."
tutorial.step3_1:
4. Specify the expected answer structure.

For example:
üîπ "Create a step-by-step algorithm and break down tasks into stages with subtasks."

5. Specify an example or a style of communication.

For example:
üîπ "Rewrite this text in the same style as the following message."
üîπ "Write the response in the style of a letter: formal / informal / technical / conversational / humorous."
tutorial.step4: Bot Operation Modes The bot includes several modes of operation with ChatGPT: 1. Free Chat ‚Äî generic request/response conversation. In this mode, ChatGPT remembers the history of the most recent messages. This is a universal mode suitable for conversations on open topics. For example: üîπ "Read and summarize the essence of the following text in 3 sentences." üîπ "Explain how to learn to prioritize." üîπ "Come up with 10 name options for a company that makes wooden children's toys."
tutorial.step4_1: 2. Role ‚Äî interacting with the bot in one of the preset roles, such as Coach, Psychologist, or Idea Generator. Within each role, the history is also saved, allowing you to resume the conversation from where you left off when you return. 3. Custom Prompt ‚Äî an instruction that ChatGPT will keep in memory and consider when responding for the duration of your interaction. The "Role" mode also operates on similar instructions that are already "embedded" in GPToid. For example: üîπ "Act as an English teacher. I will write sentences, and you correct the mistakes and suggest what can be added." (Such a built-in role also exists!)
tutorial.step5: Plans and Products All users by default have access to the "Free" plan, which comes with limited number of requests. This plan provides access to {{gptDefaultModelName}} and allows to try image generation using DALL-E. If you need more requests to {{gptDefaultModelName}} or access to {{gptPremiumModelName}} and DALL-E, consider purchasing one of the products (menu item "Buy Products" {{premiumCommand}}).
tutorial.step6: Gptokens, {{gptPremiumModelName}}, and DALL-E The {{gptPremiumModelName}} model is more advanced compared to {{gptDefaultModelName}}, capable of handling larger requests and providing higher-quality responses. The DALL-E model generates images based on text prompts. Both models are available with the purchase of üç• gptokens ({{premiumCommand}}) ‚Äî our special "currency." One gptoken allows you to make {{usageText1}} to {{gptPremiumModelName}} (~1000 ChatGPT tokens each), and two gptokens enable you to create {{usageImage2}} of size {{imageSize}} in DALL-E 3. Thus, a pack of {{gptoken100}} will suffice for {{usageText100}} to {{gptPremiumModelName}} or generating {{usageImage100}} images of size {{imageSize}}.
tutorial.step7: GPToid Fan Club The mission of GPToid is to assist you in the practical mastery of ChatGPT. The bot and training will support you in this process. If you have questions, ideas, or simply want to chat, welcome to our fan club: {{fanClubLink}}
tutorial.step8: Tutorial Completed üî• Hooray, you've read to the end! üî• Try interacting with the bot in different ways to solve your tasks. Choose one of the modes {{modeCommand}} or start messaging the bot right now! üëá
